title: C140 English Language Assessment & Orientation | Yönerge
text: Künye Bilgisini Göster Units in Charge Owner: Student Resources(ÖK) Responsibles: Suppliers Input: Supplier in Charge: Customers Output: Customer Served: Performance Indicators Reporting Period Instruction Letter Procedure Form Instruction Letter For English Language Assessment Exam (ISR-C140-01) Procedure For English Language Assessment Exam (PSR-C140-0101) ELAE Notification Letter for FDY Students (FSR-C14001-01) Admission Letter with Special Student Status as a result of Incomplete Documents (FSR-C12001-10) Instruction Letter For Planning The Orientation (In Turkish) (ISR-C140-02) Language English
